trans-unit.source: The type of the content of the data source.
Represents the result of a sorting operation.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il risultato di un'operazione di ordinamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%601> interface is intended for implementation by query providers.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%601> interfaccia Ã¨ destinata all'implementazione dei provider di query.

trans-unit.source: This interface represents the result of a sorting query that calls the method(s) <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderBy%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderByDescending%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenBy%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenByDescending%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa interfaccia rappresenta il risultato di una query di ordinamento che chiama il metodo <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderBy%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderByDescending%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenBy%2A> o <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenByDescending%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> is called and passed an expression tree that represents a sorting query, the resulting <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> object must be of a type that implements <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%601>.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> e viene passato una struttura ad albero dell'espressione che rappresenta una query di ordinamento, il valore risultante <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> oggetto deve essere di un tipo che implementa <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%601>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to create your own LINQ provider, see [LINQ: Building an IQueryable Provider](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370) on MSDN Blogs.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su come creare un provider LINQ, vedere [LINQ: Building an IQueryable Provider](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370) nei blog di MSDN.
